UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Hydroxyproline substitutions stabilize non-glycosylated drosocin against serum proteases without challenging its antibacterial activity.
Literature.Author: Knappe D, Cassone M, Nollmann FI, Otvos L, Hoffmann R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli BL21AI(MIC=2µg/ml),Escherichia coli DSM 10233(MIC=2µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 681(MIC=16µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 10240(MIC=2µg/ml)
